title: Dalton Maag Infoletter May
content:
Submitted by [bruno\_maag](http://web.archive.org/web/20080522023736/http:/typophile.com/user/3194 "View user profile.") : 8.May.2006 11.45am 

Dalton Maag issues the May Infoletter. Please find below the subjects of this edition.

Bruno Maag  
Dalton Maag Ltd

1) Your client needs a nice font

“Why do I need to buy a font? What is wrong with Arial!” If this is the  
response you get when you try to convince your client to spend some money  
on a good corporate font, Dalton Maag can help you…  
More: [http://www.daltonmaag.com/news/38.html#S1](http://web.archive.org/web/20080522023736/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/news/38.html#S1 "http://www.daltonmaag.com/news/38.html#S1")

1) Ihr Kunde braucht eine schöne Schrift

“Weshalb brauche ich andere Schriften - ich hab doch Arial!” Diese Antwort  
erhält man oft wenn man versucht, einen Kunden davon zu überzeugen, dass  
er etwas ausgeben sollte für eine gute Schrift. Dalton Maag hilft Ihnen  
mit Argumenten…  
Mehr: [http://www.daltonmaag.com/news/38.html#S1](http://web.archive.org/web/20080522023736/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/news/38.html#S1 "http://www.daltonmaag.com/news/38.html#S1")

2) Flying is funky

When you fly you have the opportunity to collect Airmiles. Dalton Maag,  
under art direction of London branding agency Lambie-Nairn, designed a  
simple dot matrix style font as part of the new identity for Airmiles…  
More: [http://www.daltonmaag.com/news/38.html#S2](http://web.archive.org/web/20080522023736/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/news/38.html#S2 "http://www.daltonmaag.com/news/38.html#S2")

2) Fliegen ist schöner…

Mit jedem Flug sammelt man Flugmeilen. Dalton Maag hat zusammen mit der  
Branding Agentur Lambie-Narin ein einfaches Punktmatrix-Font für die neue  
Identität von Airmiles gestaltet…  
Mehr: [http://www.daltonmaag.com/news/38.html#S2](http://web.archive.org/web/20080522023736/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/news/38.html#S2 "http://www.daltonmaag.com/news/38.html#S2")

3) Linotype OpenType CD

OpenType is rapidly becoming the standard font format for the computer  
industry. Linotype’s new OpenType CD contains all the classics from this  
old type library in OpenType format.  
More: [http://www.daltonmaag.com/news/38.html#S3](http://web.archive.org/web/20080522023736/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/news/38.html#S3 "http://www.daltonmaag.com/news/38.html#S3")

3) Linotype OpenType CD

OpenType ist sehr rasch zum Standard-Fontformat für die Computer-Industrie  
geworden. Die neue Linotype OpenType CD enthält alle klassischen Fonts im  
OpenType-Format.  
Mehr: [http://www.daltonmaag.com/news/38.html#S3](http://web.archive.org/web/20080522023736/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/news/38.html#S3 "http://www.daltonmaag.com/news/38.html#S3")

4) Fargo renamed to Viato

Dalton Maag renames its Fargo font family to Viato after we were alerted  
that some customers confused our typeface with FF Fago.  
More: [http://www.daltonmaag.com/news/38.html#S4](http://web.archive.org/web/20080522023736/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/news/38.html#S4 "http://www.daltonmaag.com/news/38.html#S4")

4) Fargo wird Viato

Dalton Maag hat seine Schrift “Fargo” zu Viato umgetauft, nachdem wir  
feststellen mussten dass es Verwechslungen mit der FF Fago gab…  
Mehr: [http://www.daltonmaag.com/news/38.html#S4](http://web.archive.org/web/20080522023736/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/news/38.html#S4 "http://www.daltonmaag.com/news/38.html#S4")
